00008 ModuleParmView::ModuleParmView(QWidget *parent, Qt::WindowFlags f)
00009     : QWidget(parent, f), mpm(0)
00010 {
00011     lo = new QGridLayout(this);
00012     intValidator = new QIntValidator(this);
00013 }

00015 void ModuleParmView::clear()
00016 {
00017     QList<QObject *> chld = children();
00018     for (QList<QObject *>::iterator it = chld.begin(); it != chld.end(); ++it) {
00019         if (dynamic_cast<QLineEdit *>(*it) || dynamic_cast<QLabel *>(*it))
00020             delete (*it);
00021     }
00022     plem.clear();
00023     mpm = 0;
00024 }
00025 
00026 void ModuleParmView::setModuleParms(const Emul::ModuleParmMap *m_in)
00027 {   
00028     clear();    
00029     mpm = m_in;
00030     if (!mpm) return;
00031     const Emul::ModuleParmMap & m = *mpm;
00032     int r = 0;
00033     for (Emul::ModuleParmMap::const_iterator it = m.begin(); it != m.end(); ++it, ++r) {
00034         QString pname (it->first.c_str());
00035         const Emul::ModuleParm & p = it->second;
00036         if (p.type != Emul::ModuleParm::Int) continue;
00037         const int & i = *reinterpret_cast<const int *>(p.p);
00038         QLabel *l = new QLabel(pname, this);
00039         QLineEdit *e = new QLineEdit(QString::number(i), this);
00040         e->setToolTip(p.desc.c_str());
00041         e->setWhatsThis(p.desc.c_str());
00042         //e->setStatusTip(p.desc.c_str());
00043         l->setToolTip(p.desc.c_str());
00044         l->setWhatsThis(p.desc.c_str());
00045         //l->setStatusTip(p.desc.c_str());  
00046         connect(e, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString &)), this, SIGNAL(changed()));
00047         e->setValidator(intValidator);
00048         lo->addWidget(l, r, 0, Qt::AlignRight);
00049         lo->addWidget(e, r, 1);
00050         plem[pname] = e;
00051     }
00052 }
00053 
00055 void ModuleParmView::revertChanges()
00056 {
00057     const Emul::ModuleParmMap & m = *mpm;
00058     for (Emul::ModuleParmMap::const_iterator it = m.begin(); it != m.end(); ++it) {
00059         QString pname (it->first.c_str());
00060         const Emul::ModuleParm & p = it->second;
00061         if (p.type != Emul::ModuleParm::Int) continue;
00062         const int & i = *reinterpret_cast<const int *>(p.p);
00063         ParmLineEditMap::iterator pit = plem.find(pname);
00064         if (pit == plem.end()) continue;
00065         pit->second->setText(QString::number(i));
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00070 void ModuleParmView::applyChanges()
00071 {
00072     const Emul::ModuleParmMap & m = *mpm;
00073     for (Emul::ModuleParmMap::const_iterator it = m.begin(); it != m.end(); ++it) {
00074         QString pname (it->first.c_str());
00075         const Emul::ModuleParm & p = it->second;
00076         if (p.type != Emul::ModuleParm::Int) continue;
00077         int & i = *const_cast<int *>(reinterpret_cast<const int *>(p.p));
00078         ParmLineEditMap::const_iterator pit = plem.find(pname);
00079         if (pit == plem.end()) continue;
00080         bool ok = false;
00081         int tmp = pit->second->text().toInt(&ok);
00082         if (ok) i = tmp;
00083     }
00084 }
